pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analytic Insurance Rating Techniques // Methods for insurance rating. It provides a data driven strategy for the construction of insurance tariff classes. This strategy is based on the work by Antonio and Valdez (2012) doi:10.1007/s10182-011-0152-7. insurancerating also provides recipes on how to easily perform univariate analyses on an insurance portfolio. In addition it adds functionality to include reference categories in the levels of the coefficients in the output of a generalized linear regression analysis.
